channel.title: Mac OSX Client (linux too) that Doesn't Crash after 2 Steps
channel.description:
After searching long, and hard I found a client that runs on my mac smoothly.
So I have decided to post it, to the community that has helped me out... I guess...
In the main Davids-file folder, I have included the commands to run it on mac (and also linux, I believe).
You can download it at [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?2u231265kmc2vcb]http://www.mediafire.com/?2u231265kmc2vcb[/url] (sorry about the size... I think that it is worth it though)
Credit: 6.5% Me (for uploading it, putting stuff in so you can run it) The other 93.5%: -Guys at Ownage-Pkz that made the client -Simdog1 and Dim3000 of Ubuntu Forums (guys who figured out the code to run it)-> [url=http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=9481489]http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=9481489[/url] (sorry if I am not supposed to link to other forums, just trying to give them credit)
This helped me out a ton, hope it helps you out too Hihid27 Btw this works on practically every platform... There is a .bat to run it on windows, and the code to run it on mac & linux.

item.title: Mac OSX Client (linux too) that Doesn't Crash after 2 Steps
item.dc:creator: @hihid27 hihid27
item.description:
@hihid27 wrote:

After searching long, and hard I found a client that runs on my mac smoothly.

So I have decided to post it, to the community that has helped me out… I guess…

In the main Davids-file folder, I have included the commands to run it on mac (and also linux, I believe).

You can download it at http://www.mediafire.com/?2u231265kmc2vcb
(sorry about the size… I think that it is worth it though)

Credit:
6.5% Me (for uploading it, putting stuff in so you can run it)
The other 93.5%:
-Guys at Ownage-Pkz that made the client
-Simdog1 and Dim3000 of Ubuntu Forums (guys who figured out the code to run it)-> http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=9481489 (sorry if I am not supposed to link to other forums, just trying to give them credit)

This helped me out a ton, hope it helps you out too
Hihid27
Btw this works on practically every platform… There is a .bat to run it on windows, and the code to run it on mac & linux.

Read full topic
